title: fsr-c11001-02
text: Number : ............................ Subject : Campus Visit Invitation Istanbul, ..../ ......../ 2005 Dear .............., In order to have a better respond to your request regarding your campus visit to SabancÄ± University and to have a good coordination , please take time to fill out the enclosed Campus Promotional Program Form and fax to ................. or e-mail to ..........@sabanciuniv.edu until <date>. Details regarding to Our Campus Visit Program will be sent until <date>. Within this framework, we would please to answer all your questions in regard to our University and provide you an opportunity to acquaint yourself with our campus. We close in wishing your students good luck during this busy period of university application and selection. Sincerely, <Name Last Name> General Secretary Encl: Campus Promotional Program Form FSR-C11001-02-V02
